column5: # "manifestations": abiotic things that exist in the physical world
# energy: specifically, the manefestations of energy
# matter: things that have mass in classical physics, but not necessarily apparent to the senses
# phenomenon: things that occur in the physical world without necessarily having mass or energy
# substance: matter that can be sensed
# celestial bodies: regions of physical space that appear in the sky and typically cannot be reached
# weather: things that occur in the physical world realted to weather
# solids that are not strictly fixed or unfixed
